definition: bird's-eye view/see also 俯瞰圖|俯瞰图[fu3 kan4 tu2]
bird/CL:隻|只[zhi1],群[qun2]/(dialect) to pay attention to/(intensifier) damned/goddam
variant of 屌[diao3]/penis
variant of 瞰[kan4]
to look down from a height/to spy on sth
diagram/picture/drawing/chart/map/CL:張|张[zhang1]/to plan/to scheme/to attempt/to pursue/to seek

sentences.english: This is an aerial view of an ostrich farm near Pyongyang.
sentences.chinese: 这是平壤附近的一个鸵鸟农场的鸟瞰图。

sentences.english: An aerial view shows Male, the capital city of the Maldive Islands in the Indian Ocean.
sentences.chinese: 鸟瞰图显示凸形的，首都马尔代夫群岛在印度洋。

sentences.english: This image shows a simulated aerial view of her proposal for the Performing Arts Centre.
sentences.chinese: 这是模拟出的表演艺术中心鸟瞰图。

sentences.english: An aerial view of some horses that will be herded during the annual roundup in Northern Iceland.
sentences.chinese: 一些将在冰岛北部的年度综合报告赶到马鸟瞰图。

sentences.english: Aerial view of the East Falls Church Metro Planning Area.
sentences.chinese: 一本东瀑布教堂新城规划区鸟瞰图。

sentences.english: The bird-view, you can find the Kyoko-chi, small pavilion Tsuridono, Ashihara Island and the main Golden Pavilion.
sentences.chinese: 鸟瞰图，你会发现有镜湖池，钓殿，苇原岛及金阁。

sentences.english: Autumn softens this aerial view of New York City's Central Park, the first public park built in the U.S.
sentences.chinese: 秋季使这幅纽约中央公园的鸟瞰图画面变得柔和。

sentences.english: An aerial view of Tsing Ma Bridge, which leads to Hong Kong International Airport.
sentences.chinese: 通向香港国际机场的青马大桥鸟瞰图。

sentences.english: An aerial view shows flood water surrounding Tewkesbury Abbey, in central England July 22, 2007 .
sentences.chinese: 英国中部提克斯布瑞修道院附近水灾地区鸟瞰图。

sentences.english: This is an aerial view of Microsoft’s data center in San Antonio, Texas.
sentences.chinese: 微软位于田纳西州圣安东尼奥的数据中心鸟瞰图。

sentences.english: An aerial view of Ulan Bator's Sukhbaatar Square shows the Mongolian Parliament.
sentences.chinese: 乌兰巴托苏赫巴托广场的鸟瞰图，展示了蒙古国会。

sentences.english: 2A general view shows the Saudi holy city of Mecca, as seen from the top of Noor mountain, late on November 13, 2010. (MUSTAFA OZER/AFP/Getty Images)
sentences.chinese: 从努尔山顶看到的沙特麦加圣城鸟瞰图。

definition: bird's-eye view/see also 鳥瞰圖|鸟瞰图[niao3 kan4 tu2]
rendering (visual representation of how things will turn out)
general layout/site plan
a plan/a planar graph/a plane figure
to get a bird's-eye view/bird's-eye view/broad overview
satellite photo
panoramic view
real scene (not set up or posed)/real location (not a film studio set or theater)/live action (not animation)
to be right next to/close neighbor
overall plan/master plan
floor area/occupied area/footprint (of a building, piece of equipment etc)
sketch/schematic diagram/graph
aerial photography (video or still)
landscape
raster graphics
to take up space/to occupy (space)
